textDari: .هرکه برای دیگری چاه کند، خودش در آن می‌افتد
textPahto: .څوک چې د بل لپاره کوهي کيندي، خپل ځان پکې غورځوي
translationEn: He who digs a well for someone else falls into it himself.
meaning: If you plan harm for others, you may become a victim of your own plot.

textDari: .قطره قطره دریا می‌شود
textPahto: .څاڅکی، څاڅکی، سمندر کيږي
translationEn: Drop by drop, it becomes a sea.
meaning: Small efforts or savings accumulate into something great.

textDari: .با یک دست صدا نمی‌آید
textPahto: .په يوه لاس چک نه کيږي
translationEn: One hand alone cannot make a sound.
meaning: Teamwork or cooperation is necessary to achieve results.

textDari: .همسایه بد، خانه را ویران می‌کند
textPahto: .بد ګاونډی کور ورانوي
translationEn: A bad neighbor destroys the home.
meaning: The people around you can greatly impact your peace and safety.

textDari: .از ماست که بر ماست
textPahto: .دا زموږ له لاسه دی، نه د بخت کار
translationEn: It’s from us that it is upon us.
meaning: Our own actions often bring us trouble.

textDari: .هرچه بگندد نمکش می‌زنند، وای به روزی که بگندد نمک
textPahto: .هر څه چې خوسا شي، مالګه پکې اچوي، وای د هغه ورځ چې مالګه خوسا شي
translationEn: They salt what rots, but what if the salt itself rots?
meaning: If the one meant to fix the problem becomes corrupt, who will help then?

textDari: .جلدی کار از شیطان است
textPahto: .بیړه د شيطان کار دی
translationEn: Haste is from the devil.
meaning: Rushing into things often leads to mistakes; be patient and deliberate.

textDari: .دو صد گفته چون نیم کردار نیست
textPahto: .سل خبرې د يو عمل ارزښت نه لري
translationEn: Two hundred words are not worth half an action.
meaning: Actions speak louder than words.

textDari: .گر صبر کنی ز غوره حلوا سازی
textPahto: .که صبر وکړې له تروه مېوې خوږه حلوه جوړیږي
translationEn: If you are patient, sour grapes will become sweet halwa.
meaning: With patience, even the bitter can become sweet.

textDari: .هرکه طمع کرد، هلاک شد
textPahto: .حرص والا تباه شو
translationEn: He who is greedy will be destroyed.
meaning: Greed leads to downfall.

textDari: .یک چوب می‌شکند، اما یک دسته نمی‌شکند
textPahto: .يو لرګی ماتيږي، خو څو لرګي يو ځای نه ماتيږي
translationEn: One stick breaks easily, but a bundle does not.
meaning: Unity and teamwork make you stronger.

textDari: .اگر همه با هم باشند، کوه را می‌توان جابجا کرد
textPahto: .که ټول سره يو شي، نو غر هم خوځولای شي
translationEn: If all are united, even a mountain can be moved.
meaning: Cooperation can overcome even the biggest challenges.

textDari: .یک دست به تنهایی کاری نمی‌تواند کرد
textPahto: .يو لاس یواځې څه نشي کولی
translationEn: One hand alone can't do much.
meaning: You need others to achieve meaningful goals.

textDari: .دو فکر بهتر از یک فکر است
textPahto: .دو فکر تر يو فکر غوره دی
translationEn: Two minds are better than one.
meaning: Collaboration brings better ideas and solutions.

textDari: .همکاری قوت می‌آورد
textPahto: .همکاري ځواک راولي
translationEn: Cooperation brings strength.
meaning: Working together empowers everyone involved.

textDari: .صبر تلخ است، اما میوه‌اش شیرین است
textPahto: .صبر تریو دی، خو مېوه یې خوږه ده
translationEn: Patience is bitter, but its fruit is sweet.
meaning: Though waiting is hard, the outcome is rewarding.

textDari: .با صبر، سنگ نرم می‌شود
textPahto: .په صبر سره ډبره نرمه کيږي
translationEn: With patience, even stone becomes soft.
meaning: Patience can overcome even the hardest obstacles.

textDari: .آن که صبر دارد، کلید هر در دارد
textPahto: .چا چې صبر وکړ، د هر دروازه کیلي به لاس ته راوړي
translationEn: He who has patience holds the key to every door.
meaning: Patience opens the way to many opportunities.

textDari: .صبر، درد را دوا می‌کند
textPahto: .صبر د درد دوا ده
translationEn: Patience is the cure for pain.
meaning: Time and patience help heal emotional wounds.

textDari: .عجله کار شیطان است، صبر کار انسان
textPahto: .بیړه د شیطان کار دی، صبر د انسان
translationEn: Haste is the work of the devil, patience is the work of man.
meaning: Wise people are patient; impulsive behavior leads to regret.

textDari: .صبر در سختی، نشانه قدرت است
textPahto: .په سختیو کې صبر د ځواک نښه ده
translationEn: Patience in hardship is a sign of strength.
meaning: True strength is shown through enduring tough times calmly.

textDari: .صبر کن، که طلوع بعد از تاریکی است
textPahto: .صبر وکړه، ځکه روڼا د تیارې نه وروسته راځي
translationEn: Be patient, for dawn comes after darkness.
meaning: Tough times will pass; stay patient and hopeful.
